mapper.select: SELECT cbidx, writer, title, img_system, profile_system FROM community_board c INNER JOIN member m ON c.midx = m.midx WHERE bdel_yn = "N" AND ( title like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") OR writer like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") OR content like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") );

SELECT spidx, writer, title, midx, img_system, brand, origin_price, sale_price, score, discount, review_cnt FROM shopping_product WHERE del_yn = "N" AND ( title like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") OR brand like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") OR content like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") OR product_name like CONCAT("%",#{search_value},"%") );
mapper.update: UPDATE search_list SET del_yn = "Y" WHERE search_date < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
mapper.select: SELECT count(search_value) as cnt , search_value FROM search_list WHERE del_yn = "N" GROUP BY search_value ORDER BY cnt desc LIMIT 5
